it.unipr.netsec.nemo.examples

Class TerminalNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.Node
      • it.unipr.netsec.nemo.examples.TerminalNode

  • public class TerminalNode
extends Node
    A simple network terminal.

    It has a name, one interface, and a default router.
